headline: BD Marks Milestone with First Phasix™ Hernia Prevention Case in Greece and Over 85% Enrollment in U.S. PREVENT Trial
summary: BD (Becton, Dickinson and Company) (NYSE: BDX), a leading global medical technology company, announced a significant milestone in its advanced tissue regeneration strategy: the first Phasix™ Mesh laparotomy reinforcement case performed in Greece following the product's expanded indication for prophylactic use in Europe. This marks the first broad prophylactic indication of hernia mesh across open, high-risk procedures in the European Union.
